oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
Written between 9 Shawwāl - 5 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1008 AH [April 23 - May 18 1600 AD].
According to the colophon (f. 74v), copy completed on 2 Ṣafar [10]47 AH [June 25, 1637 AD].
MS Arab SM7028. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
